The Second Circle Of Vagrant Hell

26 Dec 2012 Poetry

This is a fake post to test syntax highliting

The FizzBuzz test is common to separate people on their coding capabilities.

FizzBuzz in Ruby

1.upto(100) do |num|
  if num % 5 == 0 and num % 3 == 0
    puts 'CocaCola'
  elsif num % 5 == 0
    puts 'Cola'
  elsif num % 3 == 0
    puts 'Coca'
  else
    puts num
  end
end
